column2: p1 = ggplot(final, aes(x = factor(Year), fill=factor(Type, levels=c("Monitor ", "Battleship ","Aircraft Carrier ","Sloop ", "Corvette ", "Cruiser ","Mine Warfare ","Submarine ","Destroyer ")))) +
labs(title="UK WW2 Med Losses", subtitle="Breakdown by Year and Ship Type", caption="https://www.naval-history.net/WW2BritishLosses5Support.htm")+
